text: Dang ta lai dao mai de yan de quanshui pang de shihou, ta kanjian yiqun ren zai nali yin yang, ta faxian chu tamen wai hai you liang ge nuzi, lanzhe ta lia de yang qun. Ta shuo:“Ni lia weisheme zheyang ne?” Ta lia shuo:“Women yao dao mu renmen shi tamen de yang likai quanshui, cai de yin women de yang. Women de fuqin shi yi wei long zhong de laoren.”
